Package org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.cdg

Class AbstractCDG<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.cdg.AbstractCDG<S>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Algorithm<java.util.List<S>>, DescribedEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
CDG
public abstract class AbstractCDG<S extends Solution<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Algorithm<java.util.List<S>>
Abstract class for implementing versions of the CDG algorithm.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Feng Zhang
See Also:
